Critical.Suggestion: Adicione verificação de erro: if err != nil { ... }

Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Para cada erro não tratado, decida:
   a) Retornar o erro (wrap com context)
   b) Logar e continuar
   c) Logar e retornar
2. Adicione if err != nil { } manualmente

Examples: error: failed to check packages: errors while loading package github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/domain [github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/domain.test]: [-: # github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/domain [github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/domain.test]

Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: level=error msg="[linters_context] typechecking error: : # github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/domain [github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/domain.test]\ninternal\\domain\\models_test.go:122:43: undefined: uuid"
pkg\types\uuid.go:4:2: import 'github.com/google/uuid' is not allowed from list 'main': Use pkg/types (uuid re-exports) (depguard)
pkg\types\uuid.go:1:1: File is not properly formatted (gofmt)
internal\metrics\business.go:758:40: string `resolved` has 3 occurrences, make it a constant (goconst)
